lead_paragraph: The family that controls the Empire State Building plans to kick off a formal roadshow to sell the iconic tower as early as this week by offering shares in a real estate investment trust (REIT), a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.

headline.main: Empire State Building Roadshow Seen Starting This Week: Source
headline.print_headline: Empire State Building Roadshow Seen Starting This Week: Source
